headline: Ask HN: What do you want from the news?
description:
Some background: I'm a former journalist, and have been working for a while on trying to build a new news platform that makes sense for this day and age.

I don't mean another blog or newsletter, but something that gives you what you need to know in a way that isn't terrible.

That said, everyone seems to have a little bit of a different idea of what they would change, so I'm taking a step back and just asking some basic questions. If you have a few minutes, I'd love to hear your thoughts.

I have a brief survey here -- https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLScJRzenKFf5GyrEo2tVlAEibwNJGggHD0Z0iBahhzMgmy5vTw/viewform?usp=pp_url&entry.1573644412=Hacker+News -- but also would appreciate any comments below.
headline_zh-Hans: Ask HN: 你想从新闻中得到什么？
headline_zh-Hant: Ask HN: 你想從新聞中得到什麼？
description_zh-Hans:
一些背景。 我是一名前记者，有一段时间一直在努力建立一个新的新闻平台，在这个时代是有意义的。

我不是指另一个博客或通讯，而是以一种不可怕的方式为你提供你需要知道的东西。

就是说，每个人似乎都有一点不同的想法，他们会改变什么，所以我退一步，只是问一些基本问题。 如果你有几分钟时间，我很想听听你的想法。

我在这里做了一个简短的调查--https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLScJRzenKFf5GyrEo2tVlAEibwNJGggHD0Z0iBahhzMgmy5vTw/viewform?usp=pp_url&entry.1573644412=Hacker+News--但也希望你能在下面发表任何意见。
